coverage:country.description: Retrieve country based coverage and prices

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Enables debug logging for the CLI

project-dir.name: project-dir
project-dir.description: The directory that contains the tru.json Project configuration file

sort.name: sort
sort.description: property to sort by (prepend '-' for descending)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

args.name: code
args.description: two letter code ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 or country dialing code

examples:
# use workspace credentials to create token
$ tru oauth2:token
# use project credentials to create token
$ tru oauth2:token --project-dir path/to/project
# assign a token to a variable in shell
$ TOKEN=$(tru oauth2:token --project-dir path/to/project --no-header)
$ echo $TOKEN
Emesua0F7gj3qOaav7UaKaBwefaaefaAxlrdGom_mb3U.78Od2d9XpvTQbd44eM1Uf7nzz9e9nezs5TRjPmpDnMc

no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

phonechecks:create.description: Creates a PhoneCheck within a project

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Enables debug logging for the CLI

project-dir.name: project-dir
project-dir.description: The directory that contains the tru.json Project configuration file

args.name: phone_number
args.description: The phone number to perform the Check on

phonechecks:list.description: Lists details for all PhoneChecks or a specific PhoneCheck if the a check-id argument is passed

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Enables debug logging for the CLI

project-dir.name: project-dir
project-dir.description: The directory that contains the tru.json Project configuration file

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort query in the form "{parameter_name},{direction}". For example, "created_at,asc" or "created_at,desc". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

page_number.name: page_number
page_number.description: The page number to return in the list resource. Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: The page size to return in list resource request. Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

search.name: search
search.description: A RSQL search query. To ensure correct parsing put your query in quotes. For example "--search 'status==COMPLETED'". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

args.name: check_id
args.description: The check_id for the PhoneCheck to list

pageNumberFlag.description: The page number to return in the list resource. Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

pageSizeFlag.description: The page size to return in list resource request. Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

searchFlag.description: A RSQL search query. To ensure correct parsing put your query in quotes. For example "--search 'status==COMPLETED'". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

sortFlag.description: Sort query in the form "{parameter_name},{direction}". For example, "created_at,asc" or "created_at,desc". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

projects:list.description: Lists details for all Projects or a Projects that match a given criteria

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Enables debug logging for the CLI

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Sort query in the form "{parameter_name},{direction}". For example, "created_at,asc" or "created_at,desc". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

page_number.description: The page number to return in the list resource. Ignored if the "project_id" argument is used.

page_size.name: page_size
page_size.description: The page size to return in list resource request. Ignored if the "project_id" argument is used.

search.name: search
search.description: A RSQL search query. To ensure correct parsing put your query in quotes. For example "--search 'name=p*'". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

args.name: project_id
args.description: The project_id for the Project to retrieve

pageNumberFlag.description: The page number to return in the list resource. Ignored if the "project_id" argument is used.

pageSizeFlag.description: The page size to return in list resource request. Ignored if the "project_id" argument is used.

searchFlag.description: A RSQL search query. To ensure correct parsing put your query in quotes. For example "--search 'name=p*'". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.

sortFlag.description: Sort query in the form "{parameter_name},{direction}". For example, "created_at,asc" or "created_at,desc". Ignored if the "check_id" argument is used.
